content.raw: My thought was we could have a list of known installation paths for certain text editors that we know of, and just quickly check to see if the executable exists at that path for each one, then present the list to the user and ask them to choose one. That way if paths change, we don’t present broken options, but if they don’t, then the “Edit” buttons in runmanager/blacs/lyse work without having to dive into the labconfig file/windows filesystem.
